mapper.select: SELECT s.play_pseq, s.play_schedule FROM schedule_1 s INNER JOIN play p ON p.play_pseq = s.play_pseq WHERE p.play_pseq = #{play_pseq}
SELECT schedule_seq FROM schedule_1 WHERE play_schedule = #{play_schedule}
SELECT schedule_seq, vip_count, s_count, a_count FROM schedule_1 WHERE schedule_seq = #{schedule_seq}
SELECT seat_vip, seat_s, seat_a FROM theater WHERE theater_id = (SELECT theater_id FROM play WHERE play_pseq=#{play_pseq})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ticket(tseq, play_pseq, play_name, ticket_id, theater_id, schedule_seq, ticket_seat, discount_id, pay_id, pay_name, pay_amount) VALUES(tseq.NEXTVAL, #{play_pseq}, #{play_name}, #{ticket_id}, #{theater_id}, #{schedule_seq}, #{ticket_seat}, #{discount_id}, #{pay_id}, #{pay_name}, #{pay_amount})
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule_1 SET vip_count=#{vip_count}, s_count=#{s_count}, a_count=#{a_count} WHERE schedule_seq = #{schedule_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT ticket_seat FROM ticket WHERE play_pseq=#{play_pseq} AND schedule_seq=#{schedule_seq}
